H0.text: Which organization launched the Mates condom brand in 1987. Durex

H1.text: Which organization launched the Mates condom brand in 1987. Ansell

H2.text: Which organization launched the Mates condom brand in 1987. Church & Dwight

H3.text: Which organization launched the Mates condom brand in 1987. Virgin

A4.text: Ansell agreed to manufacture the Mates brand of condom, to be sold at little or no profit in order to encourage condom use.

A5.text: Branson soon sold the Mates brand to Ansell, with royalty payments made annually to the charity Virgin Unite.
